metadata.description: A shadow falls over an armored Utopia! Technopolis: Amazing Domain of science and wonder created by rival genius brothers Tony and Arno Stark. A utopia except...a unique disease forces everyone to wear armor to live and breathe! In this armored land a hero is murdered and the killer’s identity is a mystery Baron Tony Stark must solve. But in doing so, will Technopolis be forced into a civil war?
metadata.name: Armor Wars
